titles.title: Charitable Deduction Fairness Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals who do not itemize deductions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/9/2003--Introduced. Charitable Deduction Fairness Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a direct charitable tax deduction for an individual not itemizing deductions equal to the amount that would be allowed for charitable cash contributions if such individual itemized.
